data.title: Julia Roberts
meta_keywords: Roles turned down by Julia Roberts
data.meta_description: See which roles Julia Roberts turned down.
data.text:
Roles turned down by Julia Roberts:

Julia Roberts turned down the female lead in Basic Instinct. The role went to Sharon Stone.

Actor who got the part: Sharon Stone

Julia was in the running for the role of Poison Ivy.

Julia Roberts was seriously considered for the role of Joon.

Actor who got the part: Mary Stuart Masterson

Julia Roberts was considered for the lead role.

Actor who got the part: Angelina Jolie

Roberts was originally the films first choice to play the Leigh Anne Tuohy. The role that earned Bullock an Oscar for Actress in a Leading role.

Actor who got the part: Sandra Bullock

Julia Roberts turned down the role of Emma Brody.

Actor who got the part: Madeleine Stowe

Julia Roberts was considered for the lead role.

Actor who got the part: Jennifer Aniston

Roberts was in the running of playing Velma Kelly.

Actor who got the part: Catherine Zeta-Jones

Roberts was considered for the role of Ada.

Actor who got the part: Nicole Kidman

Julia Roberts was close to star as Julie Hastings. After she won the role of Vivian in Pretty Woman she left the project.

Actor who got the part: Frances McDormand

One of several actors attached at some point, because the film was in development for over 25 years.

Actor who got the part: Cameron Diaz

Julia Roberts turned down the role of Mary Corleone due to scheduling conflicts.

Actor who got the part: Sofia Coppola

Julia Roberts was the first choice to play Diana.

Actor who got the part: Demi Moore

Julia Roberts was interested in the Harper Lee role, but she became pregnant before the start of production.

Actor who got the part: Sandra Bullock

Julia Roberts turned down for the role of Marylin Rexroth.

Actor who got the part: Catherine Zeta Jones

Julia Roberts tested for the role of Ellie.

Actor who got the part: Laura Dern

Roberts was considered to play the part of Celine.

Actor who got the part: Cameron Diaz

Julia Roberts turned down a role in the film.

Julia Roberts was also considered for the role of Annabelle.

Actor who got the part: Jodie Foster

MONTE CARLO, originally titled HEADHUNTERS, was originally developed as a co-starring vehicle for both Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman.

Actor who got the part: Leighton Meester

When Julia passed on this remake of the French film Nikita, Warner's decided to cast Bridget Fonda.

Actor who got the part: Bridget Fonda

Julia Roberts turned down the lead role.

Julia Roberts tested for the part of Robin Monroe.

Actor who got the part: Anne Heche

Julia Roberts turned down the role of Annie.

Actor who got the part: Meg Ryan

Julia Roberts dropped out from the lead role due to scheduling conflicts.

Actor who got the part: Sharon Stone

Julia Roberts turned down the role of Janice.

Actor who got the part: Teri Hatcher

Julia Roberts was considered for the role of Marty Bell.

Actor who got the part: Miranda Otto

Julia Roberts was considered for the role of Kelly.

Actor who got the part: Alison Lohman

Tony Scott spent a year searching for the right actress to play Alabama Whitman. He considered and rejected Bridget Fonda, Diane Lane, Kyra Sedgwick, and Julia Roberts.

Actor who got the part: Patricia Arquette

Julia Roberts turned down the role of Lucy Moderatz.

Actor who got the part: Sandra Bullock

Did you know that Julia Roberts was not the only choice for these movies? (click to learn more)
